text: Leighton Baines (born 11 December 1984) is a retired English footballer. He was known for his time at Everton and the England national football team. Baines started his career with Wigan Athletic. He was a defender who plays on the left side. He wears the number 3 on his Everton shirt. He has played for England at under-21 and senior levels. He has scored only one goal while playing for England.
